Verses: 1 isravelar Mispaavile Irukkum Podhu: Nammil Oruvanum Than Kumaaraththiyai Benyameenarukku Vivaagampannikkoduppadhillai Endru Aanaiyittirundhaargal.
2 aagaiyaal Janangal Dhevanudaiya Veettirkup Poi, Ange Dhevasannidhiyil Saayankaalamattum Irundhu, Saththamittu, Migavum Azhudhu;
3 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Indru Isravelil Oru Koththiram Kuraindhupogaththakkadhaaga Isravelil Indhak Kaariyam Nerittadhu Enna Endraargal.
4 marunaalile, Janangal Kaalame Ezhundhirundhu, Ange Oru Palipeedaththaik Katti, Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalaiyum Samaadhaana Paligalaiyum Seluththinaargal.

5 karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Mispaavukku Varaadhavan Nichchayamaaik Kolai Seyyappadakkadavan Endru Avargal Periya Aanaiyittirundhapadiyaal, Isravel Puththirar: Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Sabaikoodinapodhu, Israveludaiya Ellaak Koththirangalilumirundhu Varaadhe Ponavargal Yaar Endru Visaariththaargal.
6 isravel Puththirar Thangal Sagodhararaagiya Benyameenarai Ninaiththu, Manasthaabappattu: Indru Isravelil Oru Koththiram Aruppundupoyitre.

7 meendhiruppavargalukku Manaivigal Kidaikkumpadi Naam Avargalukkaaga Ennaseyyalaam? Nammudaiya Kumaaraththigalil Oruththiyaiyum Avargalukkuk Koduppadhillai Endru Naam Karththar Mel Aanaiyittukkondome.

8 isravelin Koththirangalil Mispaavile Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Varaadhepona Yaadhoruvar Undo Endru Visaariththaargal; Appozhudhu Keeleyaaththilulla Yaabesin Manusharil Oruvarum Paalayaththil Sabaikoodinapodhu Varavillai.
9 janangal Lakkampaarkkappatta Podhu, Keeleyaaththilirukkira Yaabesin Kudigalil Ange Oruvarum Irundhadhillai.
10 udane Sabaiyaar Balavaangalil Panneeraayiramperai Ange Azhaiththu: Neengal Poi, Keeleyaaththilulla Yaabesin Kudigalai Sthreegalodum Pillaigalodum Pattayakkarukkinaal Vettungal.
11 sagala Aanpillaigalaiyum, Purusharai Arindha Sagala Penpillaigalaiyum Sangarikkadaveergal Endru Avargalukkuk Kattalaiyittu Anuppinaargal.

12 ivargal Keeleyaaththilulla Yaabesin Kudigalidaththile Purusharai Ariyaadha Naanooru Kannippengalaik Kandu Pidiththu, Avargalaik Kaanaandhesamaana Seelovilirukkira Paalayaththirkuk Konduvandhaargal.
13 appozhudhu Rimmon Kanmalaiyilirukkira Benyameen Puththirarode Pesavum, Avargalukku Samaadhaanam Kooravum, Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Manusharai Anuppinaargal.

14 appadiye Akkaalaththil Benyameenar Thirumba Vandhaargal; Keeleyaaththilirukkira Yaabesin Sthreegalil Uyirode Vaiththa Pengalai Avargalukkuk Koduththaargal; Appadi Seydhum Avargal Thogaikkuk Kaanaadhirundhadhu.
15 isravel Koththirangalile Karththar Oru Pilappai Undaakkinaar Endru Janangal Benyameenarukkaaga Manasthaabappattaargal.
16 benyameen Koththira Sthreegal Azhindhapadiyinaale, Meedhiyaana Matrappergalukkum Manaivigal Kidaikkumpadi Ennaseyyalaam Endru Sabaiyin Moopparaanavargal Kettu,
17 isravelil Oru Koththiram Nirmoolamaagaadhapadikku, Thappinavargaludaiya Sudhandharam Benyameenukku Irukkavendume,
18 naamo Nammudaiya Kumaaraththigalil Avargalukkup Penkodukkak Koodaadhu; Benyameenarukkup Penkodukkiravan Sabikkappattavan Endru, Isravel Puththirar Aanaiyittaargale Endraargal.

19 pinnum, Idho, Beththelukku Vadakke Beththelilirundhu Seegemukkup Pogira Paadhaikku Kizhakkaagavum Liponaavukkuth Therkaagavum Irukkira Seelovile Varushandhorum Karththarukkup Pandigai Kondaadappadugiradhe Endru Solli,
20 avargal Benyameen Puththirarai Nokki: Neengal Poi, Dhraatchaththottangalile Padhivirundhu,

21 seelovin Kumaaraththigal Keedhavaaththiyaththode Nadanampannugiravargalaaip Purappattu Varugiradhai Neengal Kaanumpodhu, Dhraatchaththottangalilirundhu Purappattu, Ungalil Avaravar Seelovin Kumaaraththigalil, Ovvoru Pennaip Pidiththu Benyameen Dhesaththirkuk Kondupongal.

22 avargaludaiya Thagappanmaaraagilum, Sagodhararaagilum Engalidaththil Muraiyida Varumpodhu, Naangal Avargalai Nokki: Engal Nimiththam Avargalukku Dhayavuseyyungal; Naangal Yuththampanni, Avanavanukku Manaiviyai Vaangikkodukkavillai; Ungalmel Kutramundaaga Ippodhu Neengal Avargalukku Manaivigalaik Kodukkavum Illai Enbom Endru Sonnaargal.

23 benyameen Puththirar Appadiye Seydhu, Nadanampannugiravargalile Thangal Thogaikku Sariyaana Pengalai Manaivigalaagap Pidiththukkondu, Thangal Sudhandharaththirkuth Thirumbippoi, Pattanangalaip Pudhuppiththuk Katti, Avaigalil Kudiyirundhaargal.
24 isravel Puththirarum Akkaalaththile Avvidam Vittu Avaravar Thangal Koththiraththukkum Thangal Kudumbaththukkum Poi, Avaravar Thangal Sudhandharaththil Serndhaargal.
25 annaatkalile Isravelil Raajaa Illai; Avanavan Thanthan Paarvaikku Saripponapadi Seydhuvandhaan.
